subject: ENVS
title: Ecotourism and Communities
description: This blended course includes a field and online learning experience and focuses on the philosophical, socio-cultural, health, and ecological dimensions of ecotourism, and the skills and practices necessary for planning and managing ecotourism for community development and well-being. The course will involve one or more overnight excursions to ecotourism destinations in Ontario (e.g., Muskoka or Haliburton region). [Note: Field trip fee: $500.00+HST to $1,500.00+HST]
